sentences.en: Do not press on the eyelid with the tonometer.
He heard the bad news without batting an eyelid.
sentences.cn: 他听到这个坏的消息丝毫没动声色(没贬眼睛).

sentences.en: His eyelids began to droop (= close, because he was sleepy ).
His eyes an eyelid is so beautiful that shocked me!
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛跟双眼皮竟然漂亮到让我惊讶 呀 !
他的左眼皮不由自主地跳动。

sentences.en: I think she's had liposuction and double eyelid surgery.
sentences.cn: 我想她做过吸脂手术和双眼皮手术.

sentences.en: Men favoured nose re - shaping, eyelid reduction and correction of prominent ears.
sentences.cn: 在女性整形中, 最受欢迎的项目是缩小眼睑、腹部除皱、隆鼻和隆胸.

sentences.en: My eyelid has been tumid since yesterday.
sentences.cn: 从昨天起，我的眼皮就肿了。

sentences.en: Objective : To make a review of the advancement of reconstruction of eyelid.
sentences.cn: 目的: 综述眼睑再造术的研究进展.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the effect of eyelid reconstruction replacing tarsus with plantar dermis.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨用自体足底皮代替睑板行眼睑再造术的效果.

sentences.en: Objective To analyze the diagnosis and surgery of the eyelid malignant tumor.
sentences.cn: 目的分析探讨眼睑恶性肿瘤的诊断及手术效果.

sentences.en: Open fold eyelid to to which hospital comparing applaud?
sentences.cn: 开双眼皮到哪家医院比叫好?

sentences.en: She lifted one eyelid to see what he was doing.
sentences.cn: 她抬起一只眼皮看看他在做什么.

sentences.en: Squeeze [ skwi : z ] a little ointment ['intmnt ] on your eyelid.
sentences.cn: ◆ 将这种眼药水滴入眼睛,每天4~次,每次1~滴.每晚住眼皮里挤一点眼药膏.

sentences.en: The condemned man listened to his sentence without batting an eyelid.
sentences.cn: 那被定罪的人木无表情地听着对他的宣判.

sentences.en: The room spun. Her eyelids fluttered (= moved up and down quickly ) and she fainted.
sentences.cn: 房间快速旋转起来。她的眼皮上下翻动，然后便昏了过去。

sentences.en: This is an irritation and inflammation of the edge of the eyelid.
sentences.cn: 这是眼睑边缘红肿发炎的症状。

trans.tran_en: a piece of skin that covers your eye when it is closed
